title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.35 - Interrogatories
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.35 - Interrogatories

State Regulations
(a) Interrogatories
directed to a party or witness are not allowed unless ordered by the Board upon
a showing of good cause. (b) An
application to serve interrogatories on a party or witness must be made by
motion in the same manner as a motion addressed to the pleadings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.35

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
